satellite.heading: Satellite
satellite.specs:
Habe: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube
lanja: 245 g
Fitaovana: aluminium, volamena, fiberglass, ary singa elektronika.
Orbit: 525 ± 25 km; fironany: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°
Launcher: PSLV (Vehicle Launch Satellite Polar) tantanin'ny ISRO

antenna.heading: Antenna/Sculpture
antenna.specs:
Habe: 6 m (savaivony) e 1.2m (haavo)
lanja: 46 kg
Fitaovana: aliminioma, birao fitaratra epoxy, dome aluminium volamena mihantona amin'ny alàlan'ny rafitra scaffolding.

radio.heading: Radio Specs
radio.specs:
Rohy midina: 468.5 MHz
Modulation: CSS
Bandwidth: TBD
